chart_description: This chart displays the rate at which pages are swapped in and out of physical memory due to the operating system's virtual memory management. It is a crucial metric to monitor for memory-intensive workloads, as high swap rates can indicate insufficient physical memory. The chart measures the number of swap pages per second.

dimension_descriptions.read: This dimension measures the rate at which pages are being read from the swap file into physical memory. High read rates could indicate excessive swapping, leading to decreased performance.
